params.asset: The address of the underlying asset to deposit
params.onBehalfOf: The address that will receive the aTokens
params.referralCode: Code used to register the integrator

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve

returns.currentLiquidityRate: The current supply rate of the reserve
returns.currentStableBorrowRate: The current stable borrow rate of the reserve
returns.currentVariableBorrowRate: The current variable borrow rate of the reserve
returns.interestRateStrategyAddress: The address of the interest rate strategy
returns.lastUpdateTimestamp: The timestamp of the last update of the reserve
returns.liquidityIndex: The liquidity index of the reserve
returns.stableDebtTokenAddress: The address of the stable debt token
returns.variableBorrowIndex: The variable borrow index of the reserve
returns.variableDebtTokenAddress: The address of the variable debt token

params.amount: The underlying amount to be withdrawn
params.asset: The address of the underlying asset to withdraw
params.to: Address that will receive the underlying

deposit(address,uint256,address,uint16).notice: Deposits an `amount` of underlying asset into the reserve

getReserveData(address).notice: Returns the state and configuration of the reserve

withdraw(address,uint256,address).notice: Withdraws an `amount` of underlying asset from the reserve
